reviewText:
Picture Mommy...wonderful suspense and classical horror movie1  Great casting with Martha and Zsa Zsa!!!! Don Amache portrayed
a slick villain! It is a good Halloween seasonal type movie, for all the family.
Old time favorite movie!!  Couldn't believe that I was able to find it.  Thank you Amazon!!
What a fun movie, and a real blast from the past. Loved it! "The worms crawl in, the worms crawl out!"
This is a great video for horror film people. I love Zsa Zsa Gabor. I think it is a classic.

I must agree with the other reviewers. What a delight it is to have this on dvd! I remember seeing P.M.D. on the ABC Monday Night Movie back when i was a young fellow and it scared the life out of me! Great performances by the whole cast. Thanks to Amazon for having this readily available.

My daughter gave me this for Christmas,she looked at my wish list and bought it. She knew I have wanted this movie for years. It has special memories for me; I watched it with my mom when I was a little girl and have always remembered it. I searched for it for years and only found it last year on amazon but I kept waiting for the price to go down. When I opened it Christmas, I was so happy I cried! Kudos to amazon for having such an extensive selection of dvd's.

Picture Mommy Dead was a movie I remember from my childhood. It was just as good as I remembered. I would watch again and recommend to everyone.

Murder Mansion was good for a laugh but it had a really good twist at the end.

This has been a very hard movie to find. My wife has wanted this movie for a long time. Have looked on line and even movie rental's. Came here and found it right off the bat. Thanks AMAZON !!!!Picture Mommy Dead / Murder Mansion [Slim Case]
You don't get any of the perks that comes with digital. This is simply VHS on DVD, but worth it for the nostalgia factor.
